evidence.text: The latest upgrade is awful and a step backwards. It lacks basic functionality such as cash balances in each account
This last update 6.59.1 is a mess. The stock overview is garbage. You have to decrypt how many shares you have
Much cleaner look, but still no dark mode
I can't express how frustrating this app is. The poor performance is for absolutely no reason. To be performing the way RBC mobile does with the advanced technology that we have is embarrassing
Cannot login! Always have technical difficulties!! Even after updating the app it still doesn't fix the problem, seriously considering changing to other bank
I can't activate the virtual visa card from the app because keeps sending an error saying 'something went wrong'. I already went to the branch, called for support too and nobody can help me
New version is useless….it will will not load. Now I cannot get into my bank account. App needs to be fixed! This has been like this since the new update occurred!
New update keeps crashing app - Just updated to newest version and can sign in without an issue. But when I try to click on anything in the app, it crashes.
The latest version has caused the "table of contents", (ie: if you tap the top left "three bars") on the home page, to not display properly on my iPad. This has never happened before.
New version is useless….it will will not load. Now I cannot get into my bank account. App needs to be fixed! Totally useless app. This has been like this for weeks!
Cannot get online as need code. Cannot receive code as phone number no longer valid. Cannot change phone number as cannot get online to change, and cannot receive code to get online to change number.
The customer service in usa (dial 0) very rude, and crisis. Unacceptable, don't know why those can be work in the big bank make very bag image to the bank.
Pay in 4 option. What a great idea to be able to pay in 4 payment after a big purchase. Thank you chase.
Every time I try to log into my app… Even if it's to do business outside of my credit card… It comes up with this screen, asking me if I want to split purchases or pay them overtime or something.
Horrible $25 for monthly service, from even an ex-employee and account holder since 25+ years. Even though paperless fee is charged. No interest payment on checking plus savings account.

I transferred money, from another financial institution, into my Chase checking account over the weekend. It arrived on Tuesday. My account show the money in my account as 'balance' but states that a hold has been placed on it and it isn't available until Friday. Extremely inconvenient!

Chase took over my Washington Mutual account. I once opened a trust account, stated I didn't know when it would be funded. Asked if I need to put some cash in the account to keep it active and was told no. When I deposited funds, the account was closed due to lack of activity.
Since the most recent update, the app gets an error before even allowing one to login. Despite removing and reinstalling, the app is still completely unusable since it won't even allow a login.

Every time I attempt to log in on the mobile app now it's forces me through the password changing process. Even if I change it, close it, I have to change it again and I am never able to actually see any of my banking information.

Bank of America has been de-prioritizing customer service for decades. It makes sense that their new AI assistant has rendered their already unusable, and deliberately unhelpful app to new and exciting levels of ineptitude.
Truly unusable bank. They let you get a credit card, but then there's so way to actually log in because the security verification system is utterly broken

After I get downgraded from Citi gold to regular Citi account, the app lost all my account information. When I log in, the only thing I can see is my credit card. I can't see my checking account, saving account, and linked account— the app lost all that information! Terrible app!
The amount of times I've had to call city support to clear out their false positive on potential fraud makes this app simply unusable. Please fix your algorithms or be better at detecting fraud.

The app feels very old, the UI is not optimized and it feels like a website, not an app. I am stumbling upon bugs very often. Please work on the design of your app to make it friendly and pleasant to use. I regret already switching banks.
Months of Being Entirely Unusable - Is there no intention of ever fixing the issue where logging in literally just loads forever? Tired of having to use my PC to see my balances.
They changed so you can't pay your mortgage on the app anymore, and make you sign in from a pc is the only way. Also etranfers take like 1-2 business day and are not instant like other banking apps.
App sucks and so does company for any resolve to medical claim reimbursement emails get ignored, follow is no existent. Sad.
Cannot login to my account for weeks now
Need to find an urgent care that covers me, and according to this app, no urgent cares in the country take my insurance. The map feature just seems to be completely broken

The app terrible to navigate, glitches often, and doesn't show relevant information about coverage. Information is anything but straightforward. Either the app was designed VERY poorly or intentionally to frustrate and deter clients
Nothing ever loads, I am forced to use the mobile site
Coverage Tab Freezes App: Tapping the Coverage tab freezes the app. This critical bug has been present for over two months with no fix, making the app unreliable and frustrating to use
Since the new update the functionality for investment viewing is limited at best. Unable to view my individual investments any more. Only able to see the total.
Signing in is next to impossible. Goodluck if you have a new account
This app used to be amazing up until they did the big overhaul on it. I hate that I don't just have my claims and balances right up front and center.
When I try to find a provider, it tells me the system is updating and try again in 1-2 hours. I've been trying for two weeks.
The app does not work at all. Once you log in, if you try to do anything it'll load for quite some time then says try again.
Every time MetLife updates the app it gets more worthless. The latest update will not even show my claim. The provider locator and procedure estimates don't even appear on the app.
用不了，登錄之後頁面卡住一直在轉圈，點什麼都沒反應
添加信用卡只能靠圖片識別，所有新的信用卡都識別不了，就不能讓用戶手動添加信用卡嗎？
面容ID都不可用…更新了版本還是不可用
App has stopped working! Won't let me log in!
About 2 months ago the app completely quit working. It's up to date and I'm just waiting for a new update to hopefully fix this issue at this point.
Doesn't Work After Updating app… Please fix the issue with the App not moving past the login screen! It was working fine until I hit update.
Every time I need to enter my credentials. Faceid never works for me. FACEID is basic feature with any app. Not sure UHC can't handle faceid at all
App is so glitchy and slow

Every time I get to my cart there is always an issue! Every month I go through the same thing. It changes prices and availability. I am so tired of this nonsense. It takes an hour to finally get the order to submit.
App is useless: Can't find anything I want, including in-network providers.
Don't bother: I can't find year end summary; can't find out if an optometrist is in network; can't find out if my letter of necessity has been received. App is useless for me right now

Limited Options: It's a great app if you want at a glance your past claims and details. You are not able to appeal via the app or communicate with anyone at Humana you still have to call them. It's somewhat useless.
The Marcus app is slow and clunky. On the positive side, there's lots of room for improvement!!
January 2026-Will not open until updated - I'll always give 1 star to an app that it's unusable until you update it. I should be able to see my balance no matter what.
Does not cater to other languages - I attempted to help my mother (who does not speak English fluently) open an account. However, I was disappointed upon hearing that the company

Trying to make a purchase and my card keeps getting declined. On the phone with fraud department and the same issue with card declined. Very frustrating customer when I'm acknowledging the transaction but my card is still declined
The screen for my credit card is always laggy. All other parts of the app work perfectly though
App works great but can't get the '$45 Bonus Offer' to stop popping up despite hitting the decline button every time
4/5 average rating with mixed user experience

This application is impossible. It is hard to get into. Passwords have to be constantly changed & the app shuts down telling you something went wrong. Something always goes wrong! You CANNOT look for doctors easily. Nothing is easy on this app
the app crashes when I try to checkout from the prescription cart
Steps were briefly fixed. Broken again with the latest update. Why on earth would you remove wellness tracking from the app??? Latest update no longer tracks steps from apple health ap
This is a great financial app. It is intuitive and well designed. Navigation is easy and I can do 95% of what I need on the app.
Wells Fargo app is a smooth and lucrative tool for every human.
The app is accessible, using ScreenReader software for the blind. They have done a really good job with the app
The Truist app is a mature and thorough app. I enjoy using it.
Truist has done a great job with the app. Easy to use and navigate and I can conduct most of my banking tasks !
it is user friendly even for hopeless computer users like me
